section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Representing over 300.000 Junior Doctors all over Europe the EJD's initial objective includes safeguarding the interests of the Junior Doctors in Europe by improving the working conditions, the mobility in the profession and set standards regarding the quality of postgraduate medical training.
position: Chairperson European Union/ European Economic Area Committee (EU/EEA)
